tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE marketing_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    success_rate FLOAT,
    total_clicks INT,
    total_conversions INT
);

CREATE TABLE abtest_results (
    user_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    group_name VARCHAR(50),
    conversion_event INT,
    conversion_rate FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
    campaign_id INT,
    impression_count INT,
    click_count INT,
    conversion_count INT,
    total_cost FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (campaign_id)
);

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
	campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE,
	budget DECIMAL(10, 2),
	status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
	metric_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
	impressions INT,
	clicks INT,
	conversions INT,
	roi DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE strategy_details (
	strategy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	strategy_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	audience_age_group VARCHAR(20),
	target_region VARCHAR(50),
	audience_interests TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE results (
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    conversion BOOLEAN,
    result_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE MarketingCampaigns (
    campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10,2)
)
